item.title: HobbyNotebook / Shame Golf (+29)
item.description: Miniature Shame Golf is a game of painting your miniatures.

item.title: 3D Printing Log
item.description:
This is a rough (and uneditied) log of my 3D printing attempts. I’m posting it mainly as I see no harm in that, rather than a believe that my poorly written scribbling with be of greate sorcial benefit.

(The spelling mistakes above and below should be considered as intentional here as they are in 419 scams)

item.title: Hobby Notebook 2021-09-17
item.description:
I really should do these more often.

Leave a comment to encourage me to do these more often!

item.title: Hobby
item.description: I paint small plastic monsters and soldiers for fun. Shame Golf Finished Models Mortal Realms Magazine List Imperium Magazine Contents TTG Mods 3D Printing Notes YouTube Playlist I use a specific Instagram tag for the finished ones. I started calling them “band shots” since it was usually a group who had been painted at once all posed together. I’m also tracking my “shame golf” score and I’m doing … well?

item.title: 3D Printing Log
item.description: Command Phase player gets +1CP if their army is battle forged Movement Remain Stationary Normal Move move M cannot move within engagement range Advance move them M+1D6 cannot shoot or charge cannot move within engagement range Fall Back move M cannot shoot or charge or psycic cannot end move within engagement range Terrain

item.title: Hobby Notebook 2021-03-18
item.description: What if I didn’t just post quick pictures to Twitter?

item.title: One Day Brass NMM
item.description:
Months ago (April) I spent (a fraction of) a Saturday trying to develop a Non-Metallic Metal approach.

Bad things happened, so, I sat on the post for awhile … here it is now.
